title: Rear Brake Pedal Grip - Lubricate

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall resulting in motorcycle damage, serious injury or death.
Use a motorcycle parts cleaner to clean all dirt and contamination from the pivot joint on the pedal grip of the rear brake pedal.
, to the shaded area shown below.
Operate the pivoting action of the pedal grip to distribute the lubricant.

body.name: DS Rear Brake Pedal Grip Folding

body.body: Clean all surplus lubricant off the rear brake pedal and grip assembly.
